body.name: PEEIPM Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor, Cameras for Home Security Outdoor, Solar Outdoor Camera with Color Night Vision, AI Detection, 2-Way Talk, IP66 Waterproof, 5G WiFi not Supported

features: 【1080P FHD Image & Color Night Vision 】The true 1080P high-definition image quality provides you with clearer images and helps you leave more information. Starlight night vision, with built-in floodlights, provides you with more colorful night vision images. So that you can always guard your family.

【New Design & Never Powering Off】Equipped with a high-density and high-capacity battery, the battery can store electricity for the camera to use for 1-3 months. In addition, the continuous power supply of solar panels fully utilizes the resources of nature to provide a continuous source of power for the camera, without the need to remove it for charging.

【Sound and Light Alarm & 2-Way Talk】After detecting an intruder, an automatic audible alarm will be issued to drive away the intruder and protect your family(Light alarms need to be executed at night). Bidirectional communication allows you to express your thoughts through the camera anytime, anywhere, warn intruders, and protect your home safety.

【AI Intelligent Classification】Through AI analysis, the camera will automatically classify the messages that trigger the alarm. It can detect packages, people, animals, cars, etc., allowing you to better understand which information is more important and provide convenience for you.

【Multifunctional Cameras for Home Security Outside】IP66 waterproof level, instant alarm message, custom alarm area, custom alarm time, etc., which allows you to talk directly to the person under the camera. Share with your family, view multiple cameras at the same time, keep an eye on who or what is important.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding Security Solution for Peace of Mind at Home
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased the PEEIPM Wireless Outdoor Security Camera, and I've been thoroughly impressed with its performance. Here's a detailed breakdown of my experience with this high-tech guardian:First off, installation was a breeze. The instructions were straightforward, making the setup process user-friendly, something I deeply appreciate. No hardwiring or complex configurations were needed, meaning I had it up and running quickly.The build quality of this camera is remarkable. It sports a sturdy IP66 waterproof casing that protects against varied weather conditions. Trust me, it has already survived a couple of intense rainstorms and continues to function flawlessly, a testament to its durability.Now let's talk about its stellar features. The night vision capability of this camera is simply incredible. It doesn't just capture grainy shadows but delivers crisp, colorful images even in the dead of night. This has given me an extra sense of security knowing I can identify details no matter the hour.The AI detection is another highlight. The smart alerts keep me informed without bombarding my phone with false alarms. I get notifications for things that matter, which reduces the stress of potential false emergencies.While it doesn't support 5G WiFi, I've faced no issues with my connection. The camera remains reliably connected to my home network, ensuring continuous surveillance without any hiccups.For anyone sitting on the fence about investing in home security, the PEEIPM Security Camera is a superb choice. It offers premium features without burning a hole in your pocket, striking that perfect balance between affordability and quality. It's a purchase you won't regret – keeping a vigilant eye has never been easier or more cost-effective

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very clear and nice picture quality,day & night. Very nice sensitivity.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This camera is very nice camera and it is in budget.It is very easy to install and it is very easy to connect to WiFi.Its solar charger is very fast and keeps its battery charged even in dim and cloudy light.Best thing is ,it works very fine during night and doesn't flash light till a person is too close that makes intruders very scary and surprisingly effective.I had once bicycle stolen by teenagers,now when they try to enter the camera alarm turns on and they fled from the scene.I gave it five stars and wish to give it 10 stars, but they have not put option for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding Home Security Solution
reviews.reviewText: I couldn't be happier with the PEEIPM Solar Outdoor Camera; it's a true gem in the world of home security. The camera's features and benefits have left me thoroughly impressed.First and foremost, the 1080P FHD image quality is stunning. I can clearly see every detail, making me feel more secure in knowing that I won't miss a thing. What sets this camera apart is the color night vision – it's a game-changer. I can now keep an eye on my property in full color, even in the darkest hours.The solar power aspect is a brilliant addition. No more hassle with frequent battery changes or worrying about the camera going offline. With the high-capacity battery and the continuous power supply from the solar panels, it's essentially maintenance-free. The peace of mind this brings is invaluable.The sound and light alarm, coupled with the 2-way talk feature, is a fantastic combination. I can communicate through the camera from anywhere, and the automatic audible alarm is a great deterrent to potential intruders. It's like having a virtual security guard at my fingertips.The AI intelligent classification is a time-saver. It sorts through alerts and categorizes them, so I can focus on what's important. This camera also boasts IP66 waterproofing, custom alarm settings, and multiple camera viewing, all adding to its versatility.In conclusion, the PEEIPM Solar Outdoor Camera is a top-notch security solution. It's a reliable, cost-effective, and feature-packed option for anyone who values the safety of their home. I wholeheartedly recommend it, and I couldn't be more pleased with my purchase. Five stars without a doubt!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ease your security worries and protect your home and property with this excellent security camera.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I became concerned when I started seeing more break-in reports on my Nextdoor app. I wanted to install a security camera to protect our home and property. I did some research on various types of cameras and decided on this one. It connects wirelessly to your WIFI and it’s solar powered eliminating the need to charge the batteries. This is a very well-built camera with user-friendly setup and controls. Installation was simple and did not take much time at all to complete. The camera is very sensitive with a 1080p high-definition color image. It allows for voice interaction with a potential intruder or just a neighbor wanting to borrow my ladder. I’m very pleased with this camera and highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The quality of the camera seems well made. I charged the battery to 100% via USB and outlet before setting up and using the solar panel. After install and 10 hours of being on, it was still at 100%. The black and white night vision without the light is clear. With it's light on at night, you get decent color images. Probably even better if you have other surrounding lights. I'm using this in our backyard on a tree. It's great being able to get this angle from a different area of the yard because I can rely on power from the solar panel. The solar panel is small and doesn't take up a lot of space if you have to put this elsewhere. The Eooeies app doesn't have as many features, nor is as intuitive, as the CloudPlus app I use for my other camera. The app does have a lot of features though and I like that I have the option to add a SD card or it will save a few videos without an SD or without buying the cloud subscription. Connecting the device was simple following the instructions. The volume on this camera is loud and clear. Motion detection is sensitive but can be lowered.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ottima Telecamera da esterno con pannello solare
reviews.reviewText: Telecamera da esterno di alta qualità e con diverse funzioni molto utili.La qualità di ripresa è in Full HD quindi si vede davvero molto bene (anche di notte). Può essere fissata al muro e il pannello solare torna molto utile per una durata della batteria più lunga.Anche l'applicazione collegata è molto semplice da usare.Prodotto arrivato in tempi brevi come sempre da parte di Amazon. Consigliata!

Incroyable !!!!!J'étais à la recherche d'une caméra extérieur/intérieur pour surveiller mon chat lorsque que je pars en déplacement et je suis satisfait.Autonomie : La batterie tiens super bien et de plus elle peut être branché en filaire via une prise ou via le panneau solaire. D'ici quelques mois elle sera totalement en extérieur et je trouve ça super pratique.Qualité : Je constate vraiment une très bonne qualité des matériaux voir "trop" pour le prix. Le plastique est de bonne qualité, la vidéo est nette, les câbles ont l'air très résistant. Je pense sincèrement qu'il va durer dans le temps de part sa robustesse et de sa simplicité. La vision de nuit aussi est incroyable et vraiment nette grâce à deux capteurs infrarouge.Fonctionnalités : Je ne demandais pas autant pour ce prix et c'est ce qui m'a le plus surpris. On peut parler via son téléphone sans être présent au domicile, déclencher l'alarme, mettre le détecteur de mouvement, enregistrer les vidéos... ectect. Sur un si petit boîtier avoir autant de possibilités est génial.Prix : Après comparaison, niveau rapport qualité-prix il y à pas à chercher c'est ici. C'est hyper attractif même pour des revenus modestes. Très honnête de leurs part.Simplicité : Il est d'une facilité d'apprendre à l'utiliser, maximum 1h et vous maîtrisez. C'est ludique et très spontané. Pas besoin d'être diplômée pour comprendre le fonctionnement. Tout est en USB type C et est fourni.Conclusion : C'est une caméra excellente pour un prix très attractif. Une multitude de fonctionnalités sont à votre disposition pour configurer à votre choix les paramètres qui vous sont le plus important et ça c'est vraiment top. Sa taille relativement petite la rend très discrète et rien que pour ça je suis convaincu que c'est la meilleure. Je recommande à 100% et les yeux fermés.

reviews.reviewTitle: Gute Kamera in ansprechendem Design mit Solarstromversorgung
reviews.reviewText: Schnelle Lieferung und sehr Wertige Ausführung der kleinen Kamera.Kamera wird geliefert mit Solarpanel und 2 Befestigungssets sowie ein USB Kabel für die erstmalige Aufladung und eine Betriebsanleitung.Einrichten der Kamera mittels der App ist sehr einfach und selbstsprechend. Bitte ausreichend WLAN Stärke beachten.Deutsche Übersetzung in der App sowie in der beiliegenden Bedienungsanleitung teilweise nicht perfekt aber trotzdem verständlich.Schneller Zugriff auf die Kamera.Hervorragende Bildqualität und Nachtsicht.Kamera lässt sich in Bewegungserkennung, Lautstärke sowie Aufzeichnungszeit variabel einstellen.Darüber hinaus kann man die Beleuchtung sowie einen Alarm einstellen bzw. auch manuell bedienen.Eine Gegensprechfunktion gesteht ebenfalls.Bei Bedarf kann die Kamera auch mittels App in den Schlafmodus versetzt werden.Das Solarpanel liefert auch bei trübem Wetter eine Aufladung.Alles in allem eine klare Kaufempfehlung.

Absolutamente sorprendido con esta cámara de vigilancia, lo primero por su pequeño tamaño 8x5 cm, pero sobre todo por su calidad de video, increíble como se ve la grabación de los vídeos, decir que tengo otras cámaras de vigilancia en la vivienda full hd pero no llegan ni por asomo a la calidad de video de esta. Cómo se puede ver en las fotos que añado, la cámara tiene un flash que mas bien parece una antorcha, es tremendo lo que ilumina por la noche. En cuanto a la luz nocturna es muy potente también como se puede comprobar en la fotografía con un resultado de video en blanco y negro muy bueno. La sirena es disuasoria y potente (teniendo en cuenta lo pequeño que es la cámara). El software que incluye te avisa mediante mensajes que incluyen ya una miniatura del video, simplemente con estos mensajes ya puedes ver claramente si hay un intruso o de que se trata. El software es muy fácil de instalar y reconoce rápidamente la cámara; graba por defecto 10 segundos de video si bien esto es parametrizable al igual que un montón de opciones de activación/desactivación y reconocimiento IA. Aun siendo tan pequeña pesa considerablemente, cuestión que deja intuir lleva una buena batería, antes de instalarlo lo dejé cargando toda la noche y llevo ya dos días nublados usándolo con el panel solar y la batería no se ha descargado absolutamente nada. Lo tengo a la intemperie en una celosia, el tiempo certificará su IP66 pero el aspecto es súper hermético. Muy contento con la compra por su espectacular relación calidad precio.

reviews.reviewTitle: Klasse. Klein, praktisch, gut und leichter Umgang.
reviews.reviewText: Die Kamera erfüllt ihren Zweck sehr gut. Tolle App, Aufnahme bei Bedarf auf SD-Karte, Cloud für einen guten Einsatz nicht unbedingt erforderlich. Die Nachtsicht ist optimal und genau wie das normale Bild, gestochen scharf. Bisheriger Akkuverbrauch im normalen Rahmen. Lädt sich durch Solarpaneel sehr schnell, gut und ausreichend auf. Zoom zwar nicht so groß aber dafür bis zum Ende gestochen scharf und klar.Habe Kamera in ca. 3m Höhe mit entsprechendem Neigungswinkel zur Haustür ausgerichtet. Liefert unentwegt gute Bilder und Gegensprechfunktion ist ebenfalls nett und trotz der Entfernung zur Tür immer noch gut einzusetzen und alles verständlich. Daher habe ich den Kauf nicht bereut.
